trans-unit.source: Represents a data view on an XML node or collection of XML nodes for an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una visualizzazione di dati su un nodo XML o una raccolta di nodi XML per un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control can present its underlying data in both tabular and hierarchical format to Web server controls that bind to it.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>controllo può presentare i dati sottostanti in formato tabulare o gerarchico ai controlli server Web che associare piace</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> to bind to XML data and present it in list or tabular form, while controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, bind to XML data and present it in hierarchical form.
trans-unit.target: I controlli come <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>per associare ai dati XML e presentarli in formato tabulare o di elenco, mentre i controlli che derivano dalla <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>classe, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, vengono associati ai dati XML e presentarli in modo gerarchico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> creates each view type internally through different code paths.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>Crea ogni tipo di visualizzazione internamente tramite i percorsi del codice diversi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>metodo viene chiamato sul <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>(controllo), un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>oggetto creato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method is called, an XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView object is created.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>metodo viene chiamato, viene creato un oggetto XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> class is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and bind to lists and tabular data, while the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> and bind to hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>classe viene fornita per i controlli server Web che derivano da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>e associare gli elenchi e dati tabulari, mentre il XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView viene fornito per il Web server i controlli che derivano da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>e associati a dati gerarchici.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Internally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> classes call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> method of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object view to retrieve data from a data source, while a class derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl>classi chiamata il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A>metodo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>oggetto visualizzazione per recuperare dati da un'origine dati, mentre una classe derivata da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>chiamate il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Like all <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> helper objects, the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Come tutti <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>oggetti helper, il XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView definisce le operazioni che l'origine dati è possibile eseguire con i dati sottostanti.</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Because the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView class only overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method, the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control does not support sort expressions or execute, delete, or update operations.
trans-unit.target: Poiché la XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView classe esegue l'override solo di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>(metodo), associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>controllo non supporta espressioni di ordinamento o eseguire, eliminare o operazioni di aggiornamento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the data items from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un elenco degli elementi di dati dall'origine dati sottostante.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> that is returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> and can be used like any <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>restituito da <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>è un <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>e può essere usato come con qualsiasi <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>insieme.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method to get an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> and iterate through the collection of <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> nodes, or use `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>metodo per ottenere un <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>e scorrere la raccolta di <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>nodi oppure utilizzare `foreach` (in c#) o `For Each` (Visual Basic).</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> collection of data items based on the hierarchical level of the current view.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> raccolta di elementi di dati in base al livello gerarchico della vista corrente.
